text: “Ndipo munthu wokhulupirira, wochokera kubanja la Farawo yemwe adali kubisa chikhulupiliro chake, adawalankhula (anthu ake): “Kodi muphe munthu chifukwa chakuti iye akunena kuti: ‘Mbuye wanga ndi Allah,’ chikhalirecho wakubweretserani zisonyezo zoonekera poyera, zochokera kwa Mbuye wanu? Ndipo ngati ali wabodza pa zomwe akunena ndiye kuti kuipa kwa bodzalo kum’bwerera yekha. Koma ngati ali woona (pazomwe akukulonjezani), ndiye kuti gawo lina la zomwe (chilango) akukulonjezani likupezani; ndithu Allah saongola munthu wopyola malire, wabodza la mkunkhuniza!”
